ProductDetail.ProductShortDescription: A story set on earth about a Human. On earth everybody can hear you scream.
ProductDetail.ProductLongDescription: Bob is a Human, he likes to eat Apples and chocolate. One day he is interupted in his sleep by Aliens peering over him and he thrashes out catching one in the inner mouth. They take him aboard and he goes crazy with a flamethrower trying to kill them all.
